title: Power Mac G5 Wheel Installation (Suck it, Apple) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Power Mac G5 Wheel Installation (Suck it Apple) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Apple's $700 wheels are a bit too pricey for me (so is the $6,000 Mac Pro). But can we install cheap wheels on Apple's Power Mac G5 tower instead? And will they work? Let's find out.  Join our channel and get cool stuff!   Watch the episode where the G5 "explodes" on me   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like us on Facebook   Follow us on Twitter    Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - Power Mac G5 Wheel Installation (Suck it, Apple)  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Thanks, Steve, for donating the Power Mac, and for donating so much more! Check out his eBay store here:   Also, thanks to Snazzy Labs, MKBHD, Unbox Therapy, and Braille Skateboarding for inspiring this episode!  Contact Us    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program. *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
